original_title: Lietuva antrąjame pasauliniame kare. Kino dokumentai
overview: In Rimtautas Šilinis' film “Lithuania in the Second World War. Film documents” the scenes are edited chronologically from the material stored in the Lithuanian film archives.The historical context of the events establishes the view that the occupation, and at the same time the Second World War, ended for Lithuania in 1993. August 31 after the Soviet army left the country.  kinofondas.lt
title: Lithuania in the Second World War. Film documents
